Name: Charred Staff
SkillDescription: Send out a fireball dealing amplified damage.

Name: Legendary Sword
SkillDescription: Strike the enemy with the power of the heavens. Ignores defense.

Name: Featherblessed Blade
SkillDescription: Strike the enemy twice in quick succession.

Name: Venomspike Maw
SkillDescription: Strike the enemy with venomous barbs. Does increased damage to enemies with HP greater than yours.
